hero.title: Spend Smart, Live Better
hero.subtitle: Take control of your finances with Jordan's premier budget management and discount discovery platform.

why_section.title: Why SpendSmart
why_section.subtitle: SpendSmart empowers you to make smarter financial decisions with tools designed specifically for Jordan's market.

budget.title: Take Control of Your Budget
budget.description: Set financial goals, track expenses, and monitor your progress with our intuitive budgeting tools.

discounts.title: Discover Discounts
discounts.description: Access the latest deals and discounts across Jordan, updated in real-time and tailored to your preferences.

tips.title: Financial Tips
tips.description: Learn essential financial advice, tips, and strategies to help you make informed decisions and save money.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Discover all the tools SpendSmart offers to help you manage your finances and save money.

budgeting.title: Personalized Budgeting Tools
budgeting.description: Create custom budgets based on your income and expenses. Set financial goals and track your progress with visual charts and reports. Get insights into your spending patterns and identify areas where you can save.

recommendations.title: Smart Recommendation System
recommendations.description: Our AI-powered system analyzes your spending habits and suggests ways to save money. Get personalized recommendations for budget adjustments and discover deals that match your interests and needs.

database.title: Comprehensive Discount Database
database.description: Browse and filter discounts by category, location, and expiration date. Find the best deals in Jordan for restaurants, retail, services, and more. Save your favorite deals and get notified when similar offers become available.

community.title: Community & Reviews
community.description: Connect with other budget-conscious individuals in Jordan. Share your experiences, tips, and reviews of local businesses. Learn from others' financial journeys and contribute your own insights to help the community.

education.title: Educational Resources
education.description: Access a wealth of articles, videos, and guides about budgeting, saving, and financial wellness. Learn practical tips for managing your finances in Jordan's economic environment. Stay updated on financial news and trends that affect your wallet.

cta.title: Ready to Start Saving?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users in Jordan who are taking control of their finances and discovering amazing deals with SpendSmart.
